title: Field Trial of Aeroqual AQS 1 in Calgary
summary: A 3-month co-location trial of an Aeroqual AQS 1 at a reference monitoring station was carried out in Calgary, Alberta, Canada to measure ozone, nitrogen dioxide, and PM2.5. The report details the results of the trial and compares the AQS 1 measurements with the reference station using ASTM D8406 metrics and the Canadian Air Quality Health Index (AQHI).
